alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 12:25PM EDT until August 10 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Brunswick County in southeastern North Carolina... Central Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1225 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bughill, or 15 miles north of Little River, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Bethel, Makatoka, Freeland, Honey Island, Nakina, Supply, Old Dock, Mollie, Exum, Bughill, Sidney, Longwood, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, Williams, Pireway, Ash, Dulah, Crusoe Island, and Brunswick Novant Medical Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
